rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language ('exports will reach', 'world continues to demand') without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
Segment reports financial/trade metrics, which are excluded from Q3.
The segment does not contain a question.
The segment reports positive economic projections but lacks explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes a future possibility/projection ('exports will reach up to 5.3 million tons') without active reassurance.
